title: Zagg’s new braided nylon Apple Watch bands undercut official styles at half the cost
content:
Gear4, one of the popular accessory makers under the Zagg stable, is now expanding its lineup to include Apple Watch bands. Debuting with a pair of different styles, Gear4 notably delivers a braided nylon Apple Watch band that’s half the cost of the official alternative with recycled materials in tow.

more…

The post Zagg’s new braided nylon Apple Watch bands undercut official styles at half the cost appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The very first Gear4 Apple Watch bands have launched in two different styles that undercut Apple's own pricing.
